General.Name: Alkindo Naratama Tbk
General.Description: PT Alkindo Naratama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells conversion paper products in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Paper and Chemical. The Paper segment offers standard cores for packaging films, stretch films, and paper mill industries; white paper core products for polypropylene films, polyethylene films, coated paper, and tissue paper; special seamless core products; and prime coating core products used for the composition of paper film, PP film, PVC, BOPP, polyester, and foil industries. This segment also provides honeycomb furniture cores, graphic boards, textile boards/spacers, hole pads, board layers, and display boards under the HEXCELL name; paper boxes for food grade packaging; paper tubes designed for optimal yarn winding; edge protectors; paper bags; and core boards, kraftliners, greyboards, and duplexes. The Chemical segment manufactures water-based polymers; and distributes textile chemicals. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Bandung, Indonesia. PT Alkindo Naratama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Golden Arista International.

4.Name: Mr. Dermawan  Purba
